channel.title: Esports on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Esports on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
FACEIT Logo
FACEIT is an esports platform founded in London in 2012. The company has administered leagues for games such as Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, League of Legends, Rocket League, Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Siege, Dota 2 and Team Fortress 2. In 2022, it was announced that FACEIT and esports company ESL were being acquired by Savvy Gaming Group, a holding company owned by Saudi Arabia’s Public Investment Fund. As part of the acquisition, the two companies are set to merge and form the ESL FaceIt Group.
You can download theFACEITlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: FACEIT
item.description: FACEIT is an esports platform founded in London in 2012. The company has administered leagues for games such as Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, League of Legends, Rocket League, Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Siege, Dota 2 and Team Fortress 2. In 2022, it was announced that FACEIT and esports company ESL were being acquired by Savvy Gaming Group, a holding company owned by Saudi Arabia’s Public Investment Fund. As part of the acquisition, the two companies are set to merge and form the ESL FaceIt Group.
